analysis.description:
Crowdsale.Crowdsale (/unique_chucks/17/0x1daecd4761835ffd36c4f1cd3b7325ed110ee71e.sol#254-258) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,ownerTokens) (/unique_chucks/17/0x1daecd4761835ffd36c4f1cd3b7325ed110ee71e.sol#257-258)

Crowdsale.createTokens (/unique_chucks/17/0x1daecd4761835ffd36c4f1cd3b7325ed110ee71e.sol#259-269) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/17/0x1daecd4761835ffd36c4f1cd3b7325ed110ee71e.sol#268)
	-token.transfer(refferAddress,refferGetToken) (/unique_chucks/17/0x1daecd4761835ffd36c4f1cd3b7325ed110ee71e.sol#268-269)

Crowdsale.createTokensWithoutReffer (/unique_chucks/17/0x1daecd4761835ffd36c4f1cd3b7325ed110ee71e.sol#269-274) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/17/0x1daecd4761835ffd36c4f1cd3b7325ed110ee71e.sol#272-274)

Crowdsale.manualWithdrawToken (/unique_chucks/17/0x1daecd4761835ffd36c4f1cd3b7325ed110ee71e.sol#286-294) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/17/0x1daecd4761835ffd36c4f1cd3b7325ed110ee71e.sol#293-294)

Crowdsale.airdropTokens has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(token.transfer(_recipient[i],TokenAmount)) (/unique_chucks/17/0x1daecd4761835ffd36c4f1cd3b7325ed110ee71e.sol#280-282)

Crowdsale.per_p_sale should be constant (/unique_chucks/17/0x1daecd4761835ffd36c4f1cd3b7325ed110ee71e.sol#248)
Crowdsale.per_sale should be constant (/unique_chucks/17/0x1daecd4761835ffd36c4f1cd3b7325ed110ee71e.sol#250)
Crowdsale.start_ico should be constant (/unique_chucks/17/0x1daecd4761835ffd36c4f1cd3b7325ed110ee71e.sol#250)
MODICOIN.INITIAL_SUPPLY should be constant (/unique_chucks/17/0x1daecd4761835ffd36c4f1cd3b7325ed110ee71e.sol#229-232)
Parameter '_owner' of BasicToken.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/17/0x1daecd4761835ffd36c4f1cd3b7325ed110ee71e.sol#87-92) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of BasicToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/17/0x1daecd4761835ffd36c4f1cd3b7325ed110ee71e.sol#75) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of BasicToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/17/0x1daecd4761835ffd36c4f1cd3b7325ed110ee71e.sol#75) is not in mixedCase

Parameter '_value' of BurnableToken.burn (/unique_chucks/17/0x1daecd4761835ffd36c4f1cd3b7325ed110ee71e.sol#203-206) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_recipient' of Crowdsale.airdropTokens (/unique_chucks/17/0x1daecd4761835ffd36c4f1cd3b7325ed110ee71e.sol#278) is not in mixedCase
Parameter 'TokenAmount' of Crowdsale.airdropTokens (/unique_chucks/17/0x1daecd4761835ffd36c4f1cd3b7325ed110ee71e.sol#278) is not in mixedCase
